comment: Closure of supremum of set of subsets of Hilbert space. Note that the supremum belongs to ` CH ` even if the subsets do not. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
